doc.after: Operation Pointblank opened with attacks on targets in Western Europe General Ira C Eaker and the Eighth Air Force placed highest priority on attacks on the German aircraft industry especially fighter assembly plants engine factories and ball bearing manufacturers 7 Attacks began in April 1943 on heavily fortified key industrial plants in Bremen and Recklinghausen 91
